channel.title: Can someone tell me what is wrong with this command?

item.title: Can someone tell me what is wrong with this command?
item.dc:creator: @Jddogg9 Jddogg9
item.description:
@Jddogg9 wrote:

[quote=“ytuio9, post:2, topic:332535”]you missed a } at the end. also you need to work on your conventions.

                        if (command.startsWith("skulls") && isInPvP(absX, absY, 1)) {
                                if(playerHasItem(619, 1)){
                                        deleteItem(619, 1);
                                        addItem(553, 20);
                                } else {
                                        sM("you need to have *itemname you want here*!");
                                }
                        } else if(!isInPvP(absX, absY, 1)) {
                                sM("you need to be in a PvP zone to do this command!");
                        }

that should work, or even be better than you original code.[/quote]

Thank you very much.

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone tell me what is wrong with this command?

item.title: Can someone tell me what is wrong with this command?
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

you missed a } at the end. also you need to work on your conventions.

                        if (command.startsWith("skulls") && isInPvP(absX, absY, 1)) {
                                if(playerHasItem(619, 1)){
                                        deleteItem(619, 1);
                                        addItem(553, 20);
                                } else {
                                        sM("you need to have *itemname you want here*!");
                                }
                        } else if(!isInPvP(absX, absY, 1)) {
                                sM("you need to be in a PvP zone to do this command!");
                        }

that should work, or even be better than you original code.
